title: Link a Customer Complaint to an NCR
description: A customer complaint has been received that matches an existing internal Non-Conformance Report. The two records need to be linked.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the specific customer complaint case.

tasks.description: Search for and identify the related internal NCR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the matching NCR based on the part number and defect description.

tasks.description: Link the two records together for complete traceability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully links the complaint to the NCR in the quality management system.
